None.Name: Time Shock
None.Description: Every 3 seconds, unit schockfreezes time, dealing 45 damage to enemies in a 5m radius around its target, up to 70 in total. Knocks back small units.

None.Name: Frozen Stasis
None.Description: Activate to freeze up to 3 units in target area for 10 seconds. After freeze wears off, targets are immune against Freeze for 10 seconds. Reusable every 20 seconds.

Frozen Stasis: +1 Frozen Target
